title: Leavebuster for failing to connect to matches.
body:
Okay so a while back as I was loading into a match my client seemed to freeze up. Not sure if it was due to my hardware or internet connection, so I quickly shut down the client to restart it. As soon as I was able to reconnect my team had surrendered. After I was given a leave buster penalty. 

It was annoying, but hey it was only a 5 min or so penalty so I put up with it.

However every few games I play this seems to happen, and each time it does the penalty gets worse. If I restart my client everyone quits before I get back into the game, and if I don't restart it then the game seems to crash and close itself out. Either way I am unable to make it before the game starts for some reason. 

Long story short I now have 20 min penalties to join games; punishment for something that I feel I have little to no control over. Don't get me wrong I understand why this penalty is implemented in the game, but in this scenario I can't help but feel slightly frustrated. 

I'm playing on a mac (if that makes a difference).

Any help would be appreciated, I just want to figure out what is wrong with my client/system so that I can avoid this kind of stuff in the future; for myself and everyone else in the match I join.

replies.body: Same thing happens to me. It never happened before. I have great internet and have never had an issue with league. A few patches ago, though, it started telling me it couldnt connect during loading. I am constantly on a 20 minute leavebuster timer, and its fucking annoying.

Yeeeaaaa that's no good if your client is freezing up on you that often. This could be due to some corrupted files or possibly your network losing its connection for a split second. If you haven't tried it yet, let's try running a quick repair through the client options as well as checking the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
Thanks for the reply. I'll check give those a try.
